name: soda-pop
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores 60 HP.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A highly carbonated soda drink. When consumed, it restores up to 50 HP to an injured Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A highly carbonated soda drink. When consumed, it restores up to 50 HP to an injured Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A highly carbonated soda drink. It can be used to restore 50 HP to a single Pokémon.
